details.item: Backend server exists at `lambda/server.js` with full functionality

criticalFinding.remainingFocus: Frontend integration patterns and error handling

workflow.title: First-Time User Journey

userExperience.step: Clean initial load with trip form
After save, no immediate feedback (user doesn't know request was sent)
Loading states not visible during AI generation
No progress indicators for AI processing
No error recovery when backend temporarily unavailable

severity.impact: Users may be confused during AI generation process
severity.userValue: High when backend running, but unclear during processing
severity.shipDecision: Can ship with backend running, enhanced by better UX feedback

workflow.userJourneyFriction: Land on SmartPack See clean, professional interface Fill out trip form (good UX) Click Save (button responds) Wait... nothing happens Check if I did something wrong Try again... still nothing Assume app is broken and leave

Broken Flow: Navigation between sections doesn't feel purposeful
Missing Onboarding: No guidance for first-time users

document.conclusion: This audit identifies the complete breakdown of core user workflows due to backend service issues, providing a clear path to ship readiness through fallback implementations and proper UX error handling.
